price: Kuma mutãnen Mũsã suka riƙi maraƙi*, jikin mutãne, yanã rũri, daga bãyan tafiyarsa, daga kãyan ƙawarsu. Shin, ba su ganĩ ba, cẽwa lalle ne shi, bã ya yi musu magana, kuma bã ya shiryar da su ga hanya, sun riƙa shi, kuma sun kasance mãsu zãlunci.
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذَ قَوۡمُ مُوسَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِنۡ حُلِيِّهِمۡ عِجۡلٗا جَسَدٗا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌۚ أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّهُۥ لَا يُكَلِّمُهُمۡ وَلَا يَهۡدِيهِمۡ سَبِيلًاۘ ٱتَّخَذُوهُ وَكَانُواْ ظَٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Riƙon maraƙi shi ne bauta masa. Shĩ maraƙin an yĩ shi ne da mundãyen ƙawarsu, yanã da jiki irin na mutãne, kuma yanã rũri kamar na shãnu. Bã shi yin magana. Sun bauta masa a bãyan tafiyar Mũsã, a cikin kwana gõma na ƙãrin mĩƙãtin.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadha qawmu mūsā min baʿdihi min ḥuliyyihim ʿij'lan jasadan lahu khuwārun alam yaraw annahu lā yukallimuhum walā yahdīhim sabīlan ittakhadhūhu wakānū ẓālimīna
